column3: Perform a group pose, repeating the last executed emote or action on loop. Camera position, lighting, and color filter can be all be adjusted in the command settings.<Color(-34022)>Text Command: </Color>/grouppose<Color(-34022)>Key Mapping: </Color> Available

Enable the idling camera. While active, the idling camera will randomly toggle between nearby PCs and NPCs. Executing the command with a PC or NPC targeted will center the camera on that target. Camera position, lighting, and color filter can be all be adjusted in the command settings.<Color(-34022)>Text Command: </Color>/idlingcamera<Color(-34022)>Key Mapping: </Color> Available
